title: AIIMS Bhopal Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 02 Project Research Scientist and Other Posts
description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) Bhopal has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Project Research Scientists and Data Entry Operators. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BDS, BVSc, and 12th can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for AIIMS Bhopal Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidat...
